reviews.review: Sehr empfehlenswert wenn man immer mal ein paar Level machen will und keine Zeit für 4 Stunden am Stück hat. Super unterhaltsam: witzig und manchmal auch echt knifflig! Macht bitte einen dritten Teil!
Superb atmosphere, great gameplay. But for all that is holy, play the English dub. Weathly has that nice English, almost Scottish, accent that is lost in other languages, at least in the German dub.
so i beated my friend spiky egg by 18 hours of gameplay but in other words this is a great game
Un gran juego, y tiene el plus del cooperativo, nada mejor que romperse la cabeza con un amigo.
Great puzzle game with a cute story.

9/10

This game is really one of a kind, and every Steam user should play Portal 1 and 2 at least once. I am not a puzzle guy, and some of these puzzles made me feel very stupid, but the creativity in this game is unique and makes it stand out among other video games. Although I'm not a puzzle game kind of guy, this is my favorite puzzle game that I have played. The humor in this game is also excellent.
继传送门1通关之后，马上就开启了传送门2的冒险。很喜欢这类游戏，在当时配置不高的电脑上也给我带来了很多震撼。
very very gud game i cant get enough wow
Игра норм но для меня головоломки сложные. Но поиграть советую всем.
Portal 2, Valve'nin çöküşünün başlangıcıdır. Çöküş zamanının en iyi oyunudur
Очень прикольно интересно, и мозг качает, акогда узнал чьт можно с друзьями играть просто с ума сошёл, купил игру и нсслаждаюсь, короче покупайте :)
和好友一起合作模式吧！！！
Fun puzzle mechanics and some of the most iconic and entertaining characters in a video game
The game is so fire. I got it when it was on sale. I got a bundle of Portal one and two for 3 bucks. Best money I've ever spent. Even when it isn't on sale I'd highly recommend.

es un buen juego con mala historia pero GlaDOS se lleva todo el foco "casi" todas las veces que hace algo
y este hace ver a portal 1 como si fuera una versión alpha
Un juego con una hermosa y corta historia, al igual que el cooperativo, es corto pero tiene unas misiones muy entretenidas y algo complejas para jugar con amigos
Belo jogo de puzzle com diálogos divertidos ! Tenha paciência em resolver os quebra-cabeças.
I love Half-Life, but if you asked me, I'm expecting Portal 3 more than I'm expecting a Half-Life 3, Portal is a franchise that only has masterpieces, I love this games.

One of the best games ever made. Definitely something every gamer should play at least one in their life, especially if they like puzzles. Fully recommend the first one as well. This game is literally gaming history. There really isn't enough words to explain how good it is.
It's like skyrim with teleportation guns.
It's as good as everyone said it would be. :)

GET THIS GAME! I'm not even joking around when i say that this game is the funniest, most interesting  game I have ever played, I don't care what AAA game you played recently, this is the ultimate game, this is just the best there's no other way to describe it. the ending had me in tears, i never cry at videogames, this game is beautiful and a true work of art, if anybody says videogames are a waste of  time and are stupid, just show them this amazing piece of work.
bom demais, só que é melhor jogar em dupla
Fantastic story, great puzzles, hilarious jokes. What's not to like?

2 words:

holy. crap. 
Portal 2 is hands down, the best game I have ever played.
The story, the ending, the puzzles, the jokes, everything about this game just surpasses every expectation I had coming into this after Portal 1. 
11/10, recommend this game strongly
It's literally perfect. I can think of nothing wrong with the story mode. Well worth whatever price you decide to pay for it.
Це одна з тих ігор, яка примушує пустити сльозу після повного проходження у кооперативному режиму. Так, саме кооперативного, тому що "самий сок" знаходиться саме там. Дуже, ДУЖЕ рекомендую цю гру!
Fun single player and multiplayer campaigns
Best puzzel game I've EVER played. It aged well and this is the only game (besides Bioshock 1 & 2) that has an atmosphere that can pull me in in that much. I recommend it for everyone!!

Best game of all time contender
Never really played the portal games until recently. Lets just say that I see why this series was so popular.

Pros: Story, creator and fantastic co-op mode
Cons: Not fully transtaled to some languages (that's not really a big problem)

I first came to know about Portal 2 a few years ago and now it is one of my favourite games. I have played through all of the single player campaign and have also played some mods of the game. If you haven’t got Portal 2 then seriously you are missing out on the fun.

Also the soundtrack is great. They did an excellent job on timing it with the events in the game :).

Seriously play this game. Go on play it.

Прекрасная игра для тебя и твоего друга ! Сколько нервов и слёз (от смеха) были убиты и пролиты пока мы с другом проходили кооперативный режим. Сюжет мне понравился. Есть баги. Юмора море. Мне очень понравилась. Но за 37 часов проведённых в ней мне стало скучно. И я забил на неё. Так что это вам решать, покупать её или нет. Но лучше играть в неё с друзьями. Самому будет скучно, а если проходить совместные испытания с рандомами то вы можете просто испортить себе настроение. Игру я советую вам купить для игры с друзьями. 8/10
This is a fun puzzle game.
